description:
NOTE: This course is more for beginners than expert photoshop users, and covers Photoshop CS5 and below. NOT PHOTOSHOP CC.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Now with Over 2400 students already taking and making good use of this must-have course for internet entrepreneurs.

Just take a look over on the right in our discussions area to see some of the cool Animated banners that our existing students are already creating thanks to this course....... Then Join and show everyone your own successful creation!

"This really is an exciting course for EVERY internet entrepreneur out there...."

You WILL at some point need to create Animated advertising Gif banners for your websites / business - whether it is to give to affiliates to place on their website in order to promote your website, or for you to use to advertise with the likes of Google adwords or any of the other advertising networks out there.

You will eventually need custom banners for your business, so this is an absolutely essential course to have in your arsenal. Even if you do not make use of the course straight away, you can lock in the course at a great price!

So what is it all about?

You've almost certainly come across those animated advertising banners on websites as you browse the internet. The likes of You Tube make heavy use of them.

Because they are moving, they instantly draw the eyes attention and encourage you / your visitors to click on them in order to find out more about what's on offer.

What is required for the course?

All you need is Adobes' popular Photoshop application and you will be taken step-by-step through how to create animated advertising banners in adobe photoshop - meaning there is no need to outsource & you can be as creative as you so wish.

It's really not as hard as you might think - anyone can do it! Take the course and I will personally prove it to you.

What you will learn

  • First you will be shown examples of animated banners
  • You will be shown the traditional banner sizes and how to create them
  • We will set the stage ready to begin animating
  • We will then jump into creating animated gif banners
  • You will be shown exactly how to save your banners to ensure web-wide compatibility
Remember that there is absolutely NO risk to you. You are covered by the rock solid Udemy No quibble Money Back Guarantee for a full 30 days. If the course does not teach you exactly what it promises to then simply request a refund, It's as simple as that.

Enrol Now! .... and I will see you on the inside......

P.S once you have created your first banner, be sure to share it with us in our course discussion area.
title: Graphic Design: Create Animated GIF Ad Banners in Photoshop
